DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study establish prospective observational cohort cancer immunotherapy patient GI side effect order identify biomarkers predict GI complication due treatment .
DOC.detailed_description: Primary objective - To create data bio-specimen repository enhance safety efficacy immunotherapy Secondary objective - Identify biomarkers may predict GI toxicity cancer patient undergo immunotherapy - Define clinical course intestinal inflammation identify genetic factor therapeutic response GI medication - Analyze genotype-phenotype correlation GI side effect patient undergo cancer immunotherapy
DOC.criteria: Confirmed diagnosis cancer Currently undergo undergone immunotherapy History total colectomy History inflammatory bowel disease ( either ulcerative colitis Crohn 's disease ) History colitis chemotherapy
